recipes.Label: Craft: Serpent-Milk
recipes.StartDescription:
Enrich the ink to a fluid vibrant with Edge-power.

[Sickle & Eclipse with Keeper-level <sprite name=edge>, plus Perinculate, creates Serpent-Milk.]
recipes.Desc: No Librarian of Hush House has ever died during the preparation of serpent-milk. Thankfully, this was true yesterday and it is still true today.

recipes.Label: Craft: Forbidden Epic
recipes.StartDescription:
Elaborate the parable into a potent Edge-epic.

[Edicts Martial with Keeper-level <sprite name=moon>, plus Confounding Parable, creates Forbidden Epic.]
recipes.Desc: The Colonel's lessons, and the Lionsmith's lessons, have been unkindly, and reductively, rendered as 'stab' versus 'thump'.

recipes.Label: Craft: Orpiment Exultant
recipes.StartDescription: Transform the essence into the encaustum terminale Orpiment Exultant. [Transformations & Liberations with Keeper-level , plus Iotic Essence, creates Orpiment Exultant.]
recipes.Desc: [This is an encaustum terminale: one of the Great Inks. Use it with your journal to record a History and fulfil your reason for coming to Hush House… if you so choose.].

recipes.Label: Craft: Azoth
recipes.StartDescription:
Use orichalcum to catalyse the ferocious Knock-solvent called the azoth.

[Pyroglyphics with Keeper-level <sprite name=forge>, plus Wire (Orichalcum), creates Azoth.]
recipes.Desc: The orichalcum must be incorporated, very carefully, into the vessel, so that the azoth does not escape. Careless alchemists have to move house frequently.

recipes.Label: Craft: Sacrament Calicite

Use this liquor as a base for a Grail-sacrament.

recipes.Desc: The jasmine-juices must be prepared very carefully as a coating for the vessel, so that the azoth does not escape. Careless alchemists have to move house frequently.

recipes.Label: Craft: Perilous Imago
recipes.StartDescription:
Beneath the auspices of dusk, coax the larva to develop into a greater Moth-beast.

[Insects & Nectars with Keeper-level <sprite name=moon>, plus Chimeric Larva, creates Perilous Imago.]
recipes.Desc: One wet wing, then the other, and then it shakes them dry; and from that point, it will bear watching always.

[Leaves & Thorns with Keeper-level <sprite name=nectar>, plus Pyrus Auricalcinus, creates Sacrament Malachite.]
recipes.Desc: In the name of the roots, of the blood, of the buzzing within….

recipes.Label: Craft: Porphyrine

recipes.Label: Craft: Horizon-Sight
recipes.StartDescription:
Draw a Rose-vision from this memory.

[Preliminal Meter with Keeper-level <sprite name=rose>, plus Enduring Reflection, creates Horizon-Sight.]
recipes.Desc: Lift your eyes. That's often good advice, but when we're about this business, it's the best. Lift your eyes, and look around.

recipes.Label: Craft: Serpent-Milk
recipes.StartDescription:
Enrich the ink to a fluid vibrant with Edge-power.

[Serpents & Venoms with Keeper-level <sprite name=scale>, plus Perinculate, creates Serpent-Milk.]
recipes.Desc: No Librarian of Hush House has ever died during the preparation of serpent-milk. Thankfully, this was true yesterday and it is still true today.

recipes.Label: Craft: Didumos

Evoke a chilly Sky-influence.

[Ouranoscopy with Keeper-level <sprite name=sky>, plus Ascendant Harmony, creates Didumos.]
recipes.Desc: The dream of a star is not apparent to the human eye; but its presence, once felt, could not be mistaken for anything else.

recipes.Label: Craft: Skinshuck Mead

recipes.Label: Craft: Sacrament Malachite
recipes.StartDescription:
From these green-dark earth-memories bone-borne, from these sticks of soul and substance, brew the sacrament which the earth might again claim as blood…

[Stone Stories with Keeper-level <sprite name=nectar>, plus Essential Periost, creates Sacrament Malachite.]
recipes.Desc: In the name of the roots, of the blood, of the buzzing within….

recipes.Label: Craft: Perilous Imago
recipes.StartDescription:
Coax the larva to develop into a greater Moth-beast.

[Insects & Nectars with Keeper-level <sprite name=moth>, plus Chimeric Larva, creates Perilous Imago.]
recipes.Desc: One wet wing, then the other, and then it shakes them dry; and from that point, it will bear watching always.
